name: Ren Ba
text:
Pizza was delish!! Half cheese, half pepperoni & pineapple. First time having it and enjoyed it (:
I do wish there were a few more wing flavor options but the Buffalo ones were good. Would definitely order again.

name: Weendy Legerme
text: My first time purchasing from Marcos Pizza and I must say it has been the best customer service I have ever received. Roger and Julia were incredible! Way to go Marcos !!!

text: I order on the phone steak and cheese sub and it was dry hardly no cheese and the bread was over toasted. Will not be returning to this location. I had the same sub at the Marcos on  Vine street by Walmart and it was delicious and the ‚Ä¶More

text: Excellent pizza! Great service. Clean environment.

name: believenya
text: Friday Ordered large speciality pizza.. delicious. Takeout busy.

name: Rodeema Beasley
text: Always great customer service.  Orders are 95% correct. Great pizza and Italian subs.

name: Benicia Gonzalez
text: Very nice! Very attentive very good customer service after a long day of stress I left with smile. Thank you so much!

name: Dominick Andreacchio, Sr.
text: As soon as we walked in, the first thing we noticed was how immaculate Marco's was and that they take sanitizing and social distancing seriously. We ordered one of their specials; a large 1-topping pizza and 10 wings along with a full size ‚Ä¶More

text: Asked for a Hawaiian pizza pineapple and ham and gave me way different , had to eat it no other choice tasted mmmmmm not bad but not like the first one that I ask pineapple and ham and no sauce

name: Jay Will
text: Ordered Marcos for the first time last weekend because usually pizza place was closed. The food was outstanding so we decided to order again. Arrived to pick up order and was greeted nicley. Then the Owner seen my shirt and approached me ‚Ä¶More

text: GREAT service, very CLEAN place and AMAZING pizza. Roger and the employees were very attentive.  We drove 20 minutes to get here and it was worth the drive. Would definitely recommend it üëçüèºüëçüèº

text: A very pleasant dining experience. Food was hot, delicious and plentiful. Wait time for the order was minimal. All the staff was very friendly, knowledgeable and most professional. Best of all the restaurant was Veeery clean. The restrooms ‚Ä¶More

Great pizza!
Most definitely you can taste the freshness.

name: FN Azazel
text: I walked in with my wife about 2 weeks ago, on a sunday evening. Met the owner. Clean place. Awesome how owner works there. Told us he loved marco pizza so much that he had to open one. This place is so clean. Hes so polite and that's what matters. Pizza is fresh and AMAZING. This will get papa John's out of business in no time.

name: Willie Grace
text: $30 on two mediocre calzones and and order of awful wings, partly my fault for ordering wings at a pizza joint. I should‚Äôve stuck with a pizza, that I recall was really good when I tried it two years ago.

name: Van Witzenberg
text: The people here are very nice and polite. I was not there for food, but other business, and the owner, Rodger, super upbeat. Next time I will eat when I go there.

name: Danyelle Watson
text: So friendly and always fast

name: Xiomar Ming
text: This is the best pizza I've ever had and I'm not just saying this!!! Their wings are the bomb too!!! I ordered from here several times just to see how it goes. I must say that their food and service is exceptional!!!! Thanks for your hospitality!

name: Glenn Willerforde
text: Could've been better. Food was great, but the customer service was awful. That's the only reason they don't get 5 stars

name: Setha Samnang
text: I like the thick crust pizza, just right for me not too salty, excellent service, the man is the owner,  I don't know his name but he is very nice and friendly.  You are not going to be disappointed with this place, highly recommend.

name: Hans Hayes
text: Marco's Pizza is a newer pizza parlor at the Shops of Bellalago. The pizza quality is very, very good, from the crust to the toppings. I recommend them over any other pizza place. Here's the rub...in-store ordering is great (they have a ‚Ä¶More

name: Kendra Cain
text: Thomas was very helpful.  He told us about the rewards program.  I wish the other Marcos had informed me a month ago.  I would have already earned a reward or two by now.

name: Douglas Gummere
text: We have more pizza restaurants in the area than my wife has shoes. Marco's is by far the best around. Eat in or take out, service is quick, and the pizza is absolutely worth the visit.

name: Carmen M. Rodriguez
text: Excellent and fast service. Committed to customer service. Best tasting pizza and side dishes in this area. Love this place!!

name: Celeste Lauer Yanke

text: Amazing pizza, I ordered from them for the first time last night and was not disappointed. Their service was fast, and everything tasted great. This will be my go to for pizza going forward.

text: This is our first time here, we all ordered the steak and cheese subs, they were very good, my only suggestion is they would have been excellent had they put some onions in with the meat, other than that it was a very good experience, can't wait to try the pizza's. Will definitely be back.

name: Roger Mellen
text: Thank you for your feedback as this is very important for us to know. Unfortunately my store is not yet open for business, but we are hoping to be open for business by October 5th. We look forward to seeing you!

name: Maritza Gonzalez
text: Everyday is getting better taday I when their whith me husband I try a pizza pepperoni , Oreos green peppers and cheese was delicious like old ways yesterday I eat the same good service,price and excellent food.thank to Roger and the employees.

text: We have visited Marco's Pizza for years in Orlando, so when this one opened up near us we were delighted. The pizza was just as good as we remembered it.

text: Great Pizza and great service!  Glad you are in the neighborhood. We will be back soon.

name: David Suarez Sr.
text: Marcos pizza on Pleasant Hill great experience on their grand opening great tasting pizza hospitality was amazing thank you guys wish you guys a lot of luck and success

name: Rosa Perez
text: I'm really trying to like this place but, the truth is that they fall short in the pizza making. Especially when I order crust seasoning. This last time the seasoning was everywhere but on the crust. So very frustrating. Next time I'll make sure to point it out AGAIN and maybe they will get it right. Next time.
